title: I don't have 4g/4G+ on my pixel 3a
content:
I have tried the sim on a different mobile and it goes straight to 4G+.
I have tried another sim which is 4G on my mobile and it drops to LTE.
all of these tests have been conducted with tthe physical sim.
On the other hand I had a eSim on that same phone and it was giving me the 4G speed and sign.
Is there a particular method to unlock 4G+ on the physical SIM ?
